SELECT TABLE_NAME, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_ROWS, ENGINE, TABLE_COMMENT, CREATE_TIME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
AND TABLE_SCHEMA = #{tableSchema}
AND TABLE_SCHEMA = (SELECT DATABASE())
AND INSTR(TABLE_NAME,#{tableName})>0

SELECT A.TABLE_NAME, A.TABLESPACE_NAME, '' AS TABLE_ROWS, '' AS ENGINE, C.COMMENTS AS TABLE_COMMENT, B.CREATED AS CREATE_TIME FROM USER_TABLES A INNER JOIN USER_OBJECTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.OBJECT_NAME INNER JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS C ON A.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME
AND A.TABLESPACE_NAME = LOWER(#{tableSchema}) OR A.TABLESPACE_NAME = UPPER(#{tableSchema})
AND A.TABLESPACE_NAME = (SELECT DEFAULT_TABLESPACE FROM USER_USERS)
AND INSTR(A.TABLE_NAME,#{tableName})>0
